  • Method Details

    • factln

      public double factln​(int n)
      Logarithm of the rising factorial log (k(k+1)...(k+n-1)). If the parameter is small enough. the precomputed values are used; otherwise calls Functions.gammln(double).
      Parameters:
      n - nonnegative argument
      Returns:
      log (o(o+1)(o+2)...(o+n-1))
